Articles.Content: I remember seeing a mod with vaguely NFP styling a few months ago that included baloon tanks and nuclear engines. Try as I might, I can't find this mod again, and now that I'm playing with NFP I really want it Can someone assist?

Near Future Propulsion.

Interstellar Mod?Maybe even Hooligan Labs' Airships?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43839-0-23-KSP-Interstellar-%28Thermal-Helper-Solar-Sail-Impactors-Fusion%29-Version-0-10-3

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/23774-0-21-Hooligan-Labs-Airship-Submarines-and-More?p=708298#post708298 <- Outdated-discontinued.

Or the update one

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53961-0-22-Hooligan-Labs-%28now-under-new-managment%29-Featuring-Airships-Subs-and-more

Balloon tanks. Not balloons

It wasn't one of the big name mods. Interstellar doesn't have Nervas. Also I already have it so that's kinda irrelevant.

Oh, sorry about that

I tried searching the forums and asked on some threads(OK only 2), and we just have to wait till someone replies

Oh, and I was saying something about searching the forums, I just wanna say I found nothing

Maybe this mod was removed from the forums?

Or it's because the searching system in this site was never useful

FOUND IT!

It's Porkjet's work. Reason I couldn't find it was because it was hidden deep within his dev thread.
